name: TWC Elderly VR
summary: TWC Elderly VR is a user-friendly VR game designed for the elderly. Users can immerse themselves in a captivating, peaceful experience while relaxing and exploring diverse scenery. They can take virtual strolls through enchanting landscapes, collect shells, and interact with virtual animals. Notably, we've incorporated scenes from 1950s-70s Hong Kong, including estates and wedding banquets. TWC Elderly VR offers an interactive experience for the unique needs and interests of our elderly players.
